records.location_details: An emergency port in Greece. Specific location details are redacted.
records.context_note: Along with other Frontex members, Text Removed - Justification 2 was riding a rented scooter to view the Text Removed - Justification 4 emergency port. In a sharp road turn, the scooter ran over some loose stones, causing it to slip and overturned. In the accident, he injured his left arm, his legs and his big toe. Worst injury was his arm that received an open wound. The injured Frontex member were taken by other Frontex members to the local doctor/infirmary Text Removed - Justification 4, where his wounds were cleaned and the wound on his arm sewed with 20-22 stitches. Text Removed Justification 3. It is expected that the injuries will not cause long-term or lasting damage Text Removed - Justification 2. Text Removed Justification 3, 6. Text Removed - Justification 3, 5. The vehicle sustained only minor material damage. The compensation for this has been clarified with the owner of the scooter.
records.evidence_quote: Along with other Frontex members, Text Removed - Justification 2 was riding a rented scooter to view the Text Removed - Justification 4 emergency port. In a sharp road turn, the scooter ran over some loose stones, causing it to slip and overturned.

records.location_details: Mytilini, Lesvos, Greece. An individual twisted an ankle in a small hole while walking on the street.
records.context_note: Walking on the street in Mytilini, on 18.06.2020 afternoon, Text Removed - Justification 2 twisted the ankle in a small hole. She had an appointment immediately with the doctor and the doctor prescribed crutches for 4 days. It is just a little injury and normally she could walk normally on Monday, 22.06. She will have another appointment on Monday afternoon just to make a second medical check. The doctor prescribed crutches for 4 days Text Removed - Justification 3, 5 Text Removed - Justification 3, 5
records.evidence_quote: Walking on the street in Mytilini, on 18.06.2020 afternoon, Text Removed - Justification 2 twisted the ankle in a small hole.

records.location_details: On board a vessel in Greece. Specific location details are redacted.
records.where_clear: On board a vessel in Greece
records.context_note: An accident happened on 10 May in the afternoon on board of Text Removed - Justification 6- involving Text Removed - Justification 2. During maintenance activity of the vessel the officer fell down and injured his leg. At the beginning it didn't appear as a serious accident. The day after (on 11 May) the officer was examined Text Removed - Justification 3,4 and the result of X-Ray was Tibia fissure. Text Removed - Justification 3. (18/05/2020) Text Removed - Justification 2,3 was informed today. (12/05/2020).
records.evidence_quote: An accident happened on 10 May in the afternoon on board of Text Removed - Justification 6- involving Text Removed - Justification 2. During maintenance activity of the vessel the officer fell down and injured his leg.

records.location_details: RIC VIAL camp, Chios, Greece. Fires broke out in offices and canteen, cars set on fire, refugees engaged in stone fight with HP.
records.context_note: During the night fires broke out in the offices of the Asylum Service, as well as in the canteen of RIC VIAL. Two cars were also set on fire, while the refugees were engaged in a stone fight with HP. The riots actually broke out as reaction of the death of a 47 year old IRN woman. Moreover several tents and containers outside the main building, but also inside the main building, where all the organisations and agencies are located, were damaged and destroyed. Text Removed - Justification 3. In addition to that, Text Removed - Justification 3 cleared up the situation on site and were able to find out that, regarding to the damages inside RIC Vial, also FX containers are concerned. Obviously there are basically glass harms and damages of the container outer walls, etc. no completely destruction, as well as no vandalism inside the containers concerning more FX assets. Broken windows covered. Text Removed - Justification 3. Minor damages for the Frontex containers. Nothing observed missing from the containers. Minor damages for the Frontex containers. Nothing observed missing from the containers. Text Removed - Justification 3
records.evidence_quote: During the night fires broke out in the offices of the Asylum Service, as well as in the canteen of RIC VIAL. Two cars were also set on fire, while the refugees were engaged in a stone fight with HP.

records.location_details: Surroundings of Vial camp, Chios, Greece. Team members' rental car was intercepted and damaged by a crowd during demonstrations.
records.where_clear: Surroundings of Vial camp, Chios, Greece
records.context_note: Today, at about 19:45 hours, after the registration process in the Vial camp was over, 2 Team Members (Text Removed - Justification 2) were involved in an incident, allegedly with locals. After attempting to leave the camp through the normal access, they had to return back due to demonstrations. During their second attempt to leave the area, in the surroundings of the camp, crowd intercepted their vehicle and started damaging the rental car (at least both mirrors are broken). After this incident, they managed to turn the car around and return back to Vial camp, were they remain to this point. The rest of the damages in the car still need to be assessed. Local Hellenic Police coordinator met with the affected TMS and provides all necessary support. Text Removed - Justification 3. Text Removed - Justification 3. Additional measures to ensure the safety of the deployed staff will be discussed with HP. None of the officers reported to suffer from any physical harm, yet they are affected by the incident. Additional measures to ensure the safety of the deployed staff will be discussed with HP.
records.evidence_quote: 2 Team Members (Text Removed - Justification 2) were involved in an incident, allegedly with locals. ... crowd intercepted their vehicle and started damaging the rental car (at least both mirrors are broken).
